maker: Clock movement by Jean Romilly, Case attributed to Charles Cressent, Bracket by Jean-Joseph de Saint-Germain
title: Clock on Bracket (Cartel sur une console)
description: Clock on Bracket (Cartel sur une console); Clock movement by Jean Romilly (French, 1714 - 1796, master 1752), Case attributed to Charles Cressent (French, 1685 - 1768, master 1719), Bracket by Jean-Joseph de Saint-Germain (French, 1719 - 1791, master 1748); Paris, France; about 1758; Gilt bronze, enameled metal; glass; 127.7 × 47 × 20.3 cm (50 1/4 × 18 1/2 × 8 in.); 71.DB.115; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
